CustomField.description: This field identifies the class to be used when creating a Log Timer, which can be dynamically loaded and instantiated using the rflib_LoggerUtil.createLogTimer(...) method.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please provide the name of the Apex class implementing the rflib_LogTimer interface. This class will be dynamically instantiated and used in your Apex code. Please use caution when changing the default value.
CustomField.label: Log Timer Class Name
